title: Team Zero Legion Gold +
body:
We are a Serious Team .
We do not tolerate teammates who are late for practice daily that is a no no .
The most important rule is to show up for practice . The rest we will work on .

Zero Legion is currently Looking for a Top / Support / Jungle / Adc .
Practice times are from 3 pm Central time zone - 6 pm .
